# to make the [[trip]], to [[travel]] (in order to take part in something), to come and see
types.html:
faire le déplacement

  1. to make the trip, to travel (in order to take part in something), to come and see
trans: to make the trip, to travel , to come and see

title: faire le déplacement
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /fɛʁ lə de.plas.mɑ̃/
